responses.cost:
💰 **Solar System Costs in India:**

• **Residential (1-10kW):** ₹40,000-₹80,000 per kW
• **Commercial (10kW+):** ₹35,000-₹65,000 per kW
• **5kW home system:** ₹2-4 lakhs (after subsidies)
• **10kW system:** ₹4-7 lakhs (after subsidies)

*Prices include panels, inverter, installation & 5-year warranty*

Would you like a personalized quote? 📋
responses.financing:
💳 **Solar Financing Options:**

**1. Cash Purchase** ✅ Best ROI, immediate ownership
**2. Solar Loan** 🏦 2-6% interest, 5-15 year terms
**3. Lease/PPA** 📄 ₹0 down, pay monthly
**4. NBFC Financing** 💰 Up to 80% funding

**EMI Example:**
₹5L system → ₹8,500/month for 5 years
Savings: ₹12,000/month
**Net Benefit:** ₹3,500/month from day 1! 📈

Want to calculate your EMI? 🧮
responses.installation:
🔧 **Solar Installation Process:**

**Step 1:** Site Survey & Design (1-2 days)
**Step 2:** Permits & Approvals (7-15 days)
**Step 3:** Equipment Procurement (3-7 days)
**Step 4:** Installation (1-3 days)
**Step 5:** Grid Connection & Testing (2-5 days)
**Step 6:** Net Metering Setup (7-30 days)

⏱️ **Total Time:** 3-8 weeks
🏠 **Roof Requirements:** 100 sq ft per kW

Need a site assessment? We offer free surveys! 📋
responses.maintenance:
🧹 **Solar Maintenance Guide:**

**Monthly:** Visual inspection
**Quarterly:** Panel cleaning (more in dusty areas)
**Annually:** Professional checkup

**Cleaning Tips:**
• Early morning or evening
• Use soft brush and water
• Avoid harsh chemicals
• Professional cleaning available

**Monitoring:**
• Mobile app for performance tracking
• Alert system for issues
• Remote monitoring included

**Costs:** ₹2-5k annually
**Performance impact:** 15-20% loss if not cleaned

Want to know about our maintenance packages? 🔧
responses.savings:
📊 **Solar Savings Calculator:**

**Example 5kW System:**
• Monthly Generation: 750 units
• Current Bill: ₹15,000/month
• With Solar: ₹2,000/month
• **Monthly Savings: ₹13,000** 💰
• **Annual Savings: ₹1,56,000** 📈
• **25-year Savings: ₹39 lakhs** 🎯

**Payback Period:** 3-4 years
**ROI:** 25-30% annually

To calculate YOUR savings, I need:
• Monthly electricity bill amount
• Location (for sunlight hours)
• Roof space available

Shall we calculate your potential savings? 🧮
responses.subsidy:
🏛️ **Government Subsidies Available:**

• **Central Subsidy:** Up to ₹18,000 per kW (max 3kW)
• **State Subsidies:** Additional 10-30% in many states
• **Net Metering:** Sell excess power back to grid
• **Tax Benefits:** 30% depreciation for businesses
• **Low-interest loans:** 2-6% interest rates

**Example:** 5kW system costs ₹3L → After subsidy ₹1.8L

Which state are you in? I can check specific subsidies! 🗺️
responses.technical:
🔬 **Technical Information:**

**Panel Types:**
• Monocrystalline: 20-22% efficiency, premium
• Polycrystalline: 18-20% efficiency, economical
• Bifacial: 25% more power, latest technology

**Inverter Types:**
• String Inverters: Cost-effective
• Power Optimizers: Better performance
• Microinverters: Maximum efficiency

**System Specifications:**
• Warranty: 25 years on panels, 5-12 years on inverters
• Performance: 80% efficiency after 25 years
• Maintenance: Minimal, cleaning 2-4 times/year

Any specific technical questions? ⚙️
responses.types:
⚡ **Solar System Types:**

**🔌 On-Grid (Grid-Tied)**
• Connected to electricity grid
• Sell excess power back
• No battery backup
• Cost: ₹40-60k per kW
• Best for: Reliable grid areas

**🔋 Off-Grid (Standalone)**
• Complete independence
• Battery backup included
• Works during power cuts
• Cost: ₹80-120k per kW
• Best for: Remote areas

**⚡🔋 Hybrid System**
• Best of both worlds
• Grid connection + batteries
• Backup during outages
• Cost: ₹70-100k per kW
• Best for: Urban areas with power cuts

Which type interests you? 🤔
